abstract: The object that manages the HTTP cookies for your website.
overview:
## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore] object in this property to manage your website’s cookies. A cookie store object contains methods to add new cookies, and to remove cookies that don’t apply to your content. For example, you might initially use this object to add a cookie for the user’s login credentials and then delete that cookie when the user logs out.

# httpCookieStore

**Instance Property**

The object that manages the HTTP cookies for your website.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var httpCookieStore: WKHTTPCookieStore { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore] object in this property to manage your website’s cookies. A cookie store object contains methods to add new cookies, and to remove cookies that don’t apply to your content. For example, you might initially use this object to add a cookie for the user’s login credentials and then delete that cookie when the user logs out.
title: httpCookieStore
